title: Dark Justice: Book #1 God's Canyon
description: From Bestselling Lesbian Author Erin Wade comes a newand different paranormal romance. You will cheer andcry for Courtney and Sage as they navigate first-time experiencesfor both of them.Award-winning producer Courtney Southerland turned downlucrative career opportunities to learn the truth about thelegend of Palo Duro Canyon. Determined to track the famousBlack Panther and the girl that had been seen with it, Courtdevoted two years of her life living in caves and tents asshe tracked the pair through the second largest canyon inthe United States. She was about to relegate the pantherâ€™slegend to the category of Big Foot and the Loch Ness Monsterwhen the girl appeared from nowhere to save her life.Not suitable for young adults. WLW, Sapphic, LGBT, Lesfic
author: Erin  Wade
